Good quality and all, but the sounds is like 200ms before the video (easy to correct with VLC media player) and the subtitles are WAY off. When a guy says "Yikes!" the subtitles says "yes!", things like this in all episodes. What a half-assed job on the subtitles! Everything else is super!
The guy that made the subs gotta be hearing impaired or something..

Pros: V-10|A-10 if i didn't know better i'd think i was watching the actual Dvd.

Cons: Well its not HD nor does it claim to be but it is crystal clear with great sound.

Ps. All the seasons by Riddler are the same quality and they all download extremely fast i'm already through to season 4 episode 11 and every rip so far is same and perfect.
RiddlerA never disappoints.. great job on these
